insert into alarm_info (system_ip, user_name, login_ip, result, device_name, channel_name, type, log_type, record_time, notice_rank, count, content, actual_capacity, handle_state, handle_msg, handle_user, sip, dip, sport, dport, protocol, client_user, priority, class_type, severity, ddos_type, app_name, rule_name, filter_type, action, `describe`, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{systemIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{noticeRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualCapacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{handleMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{severity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddosType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update alarm_info
system_ip = #{systemIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
notice_rank = #{noticeRank,jdbcType=TINYINT},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_state = #{handleState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
handle_msg = #{handleMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_user = #{handleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update alarm_info set system_ip = #{systemIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, notice_rank = #{noticeRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_state = #{handleState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, handle_msg = #{handleMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_user = #{handleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update alarm_info set handle_state = #{handleState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, handle_msg = #{handleMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_user = #{handleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where handle_state != 1
and type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS gmt_create FROM alarm_info where handle_state = 1 ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT ${oldLimit},1
mapper.delete: delete from alarm_info where handle_state = 1 and gmt_create <= #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
